title: Manage from Remote Operations Center
description: An operator in a remote operations center (ROC) in a city is controlling equipment at a mine site thousands of kilometers away.

tasks.description: Log into the system and take control of a semi-autonomous dozer at the mine site.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator establishes a secure connection and has control of the dozer.

tasks.description: Using video feeds and sensor data, operate the dozer to clean up the area around a shovel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dozer task is completed efficiently and safely from the remote location.

tasks.description: After completing the task, park the dozer in a safe location and hand control back to the autonomous system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The remote operation is completed, and the equipment is returned to autonomous mode.
